description: Our goal for the 2014-2015 year is to create a more member-focused environment that encourages higher retention and establish lasting relationships with APAC and non-APAC organizations while exploring APA issues.

goals.name: Service
goals.description: To serve and promote the needs of Asian Americans at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign as well as within the local community.

goals.name: Educate
goals.description: To educate the university and community on current Asian American issues as well as prejudices and stereotypes that people may harbor upon Asian Americans.

goals.name: Program
goals.description: To promote awareness of Asian American heritage to the university and community through programming on Asian American history and culture.

goals.name: Socialize
goals.description: To provide social activities and opportunities for Asian American Association members as well as nonmembers to build strong relationships and families.

goals.name: Collaborate
goals.description: To support and work in coalition with other organizations who are willing to support and contribute to the protection and services of Asian American community.

goals.name: Network
goals.description: To network and maintain connections with Asian American Association's alumni to facilitate and strengthen the legacy of the organization.
